articles.headline: Gibbs has career-high 218 yards of offense and 2 TDs, helping Lions bounce back and beat Bucs 24-9
articles.description: — Jahmyr Gibbs was offered oxygen on the bench after a 78-yard run.

articles.headline: Jahmyr Gibbs runs wild as Lions top Bucs on MNF
articles.description: The Lions cruise past the Buccaneers thanks to a big performance from Jahmyr Gibbs.

articles.headline: NFL Week 7: Biggest questions, takeaways for every game
articles.description: Our NFL Nation reporters answer the biggest questions out of each game. Here's what we learned from Week 7.

articles.headline: Source: Titans releasing veteran wide receiver Tyler Lockett
articles.description: Tyler Lockett asked the Titans for his release and was granted it Monday, a source said.

articles.headline: NFL Week 7: Eagles-Vikings, Pats-Titans, Commanders-Cowboys power quote quiz
articles.description: Week 7 in the NFL offered up-front quotes and self-reflection. Put your knowledge to the test with our quote quiz.

articles.headline: Why Mike McCoy's Titans coaching debut ended in Vrabel chants
articles.description: McCoy took over for fired coach Brian Callahan, but the results were the same for 1-6 Tennessee.

articles.headline: Week 7 NFL highlights: Best plays, moments and touchdowns
articles.description: A look at the best plays around the NFL in Week 7.

articles.headline: NFL Week 7: Biggest questions, takeaways for every game
articles.description: Our NFL Nation reporters answer the biggest questions out of each game. Here's what we learned from Week 7.

articles.headline: Daniels' hamstring injury 'not significant'; Armstrong has torn ACL
articles.description: Commanders coach Dan Quinn said Monday that Jayden Daniels' hamstring injury "was not significant" but that Dorance Armstrong has a season-ending torn ACL.

articles.headline: Dan Quinn: Jayden Daniels' injury 'not significant'
articles.description: Commanders coach Dan Quinn provides an update on quarterback Jayden Daniels' hamstring injury.

articles.headline: Lamb has a 74-yard TD catch and Bland gets a pick-6 as Cowboys beat Commanders 44-22
articles.description: — CeeDee Lamb ran sideways, arms in the air with the ball in one hand while finishing off a 74-yard touchdown catch with new sidekick George Pickens backpedaling into the end zone at the same time from just a few yards away.

articles.headline: Jayden Daniels exits Commanders' loss; MRI on hamstring next
articles.description: Commanders quarterback Jayden Daniels suffered a right hamstring injury early in the third quarter against the Dallas Cowboys on Sunday and was later ruled out, yet another blow to a banged-up Washington offense.
